summary: This is an internal email from the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) New York, dated July 8, 2019, detailing the intake and initial handling of inmate Jeffrey Epstein (Reg. 76318-054). It reports his arrival on July 6, placement in special housing, his court arraignment, and plans for a psychological/suicide risk assessment. It also notes media presence around the facility.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: The subject of the email; an inmate who arrived at MCC New York on July 6, 2019, was placed in special housing, arraigned in court, and is scheduled for a psychological/suicide risk assessment.

events.title: Epstein's Arrival at MCC New York
events.description: Jeffrey Epstein arrived at the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) New York at 9:24 PM and was placed in the Special Housing Unit.

events.title: Epstein's Court Arraignment and Scheduled Assessment
events.description: Jeffrey Epstein was arraigned in court. Upon his return to MCC, he was to be seen by Psychology for a suicide risk assessment, with instructions to place him on psychological observation or suicide watch depending on the outcome.

locations: MCC New York (Metropolitan Correctional Center, New York)
Court house (near MCC New York, less than 100 yards away)
keyFacts: Jeffrey Epstein arrived at MCC New York as inmate Reg. 76318-054 on July 6, 2019, at 9:24 PM.
He was initially placed in the Special Housing Unit pending evaluation for suitable housing.
He was arraigned in court on July 8, 2019, and was scheduled for a psychological suicide risk assessment upon his return.
The email contains specific protocols for placing Epstein on psychological observation or suicide watch based on the assessment or if he self-reports as suicidal.
Media inquiries were received and media were staged around the MCC building and the nearby courthouse.
